articles.title: Bog Apple: NYC discovers stand-alone toilet pods
articles.author: George CLYDE
articles.summary: Madden Fabrication's 'Portland Loos,' modular public conveniences, are being introduced in New York to combat the lack of public restrooms. The city has ordered five trial units, with modifications to meet local planning rules, and has installed one unit in the Bronx's Joyce Kilmer park.

articles.title: Bog Apple: NYC discovers stand-alone toilet pods
articles.author: George Clyde
articles.summary: New York City is trialing 'Portland Loos,' modular public restrooms designed by Madden Fabrication. The city has ordered five units with modifications, including higher-grade stainless steel, to address the shortage of public restroom access, with plans to build 49 new public bathrooms by 2029.

articles.title: Kehlani announces free 'Nini's Fluff & Fold' laundry service for mothers
articles.summary: Kehlani launched 'Nini's Fluff & Fold,' a free laundry service for mothers in major U.S. cities, starting August 9. The service, named after her daughter's nickname, is an extension of her single 'Folded' and aims to provide self-care in a practical way by offering free wash-and-fold services.

articles.title: The New ChatGPT Resets the AI Race
articles.author: Matteo Wong
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, a new AI model intended to be an upgrade to ChatGPT. This new version focuses on user experience, offering improvements in writing, coding, math, and science and is designed to be more intuitive, fast, and personalized. Alongside GPT-5, OpenAI announced new ChatGPT features like customizable color schemes, personalities, and integration with Gmail and Google Calendar.

articles.title: Why I'm obsessed with this 50% off silk pillowcase
articles.author: Charlotte Finch
articles.summary: Blissy is promoting their 100% pure mulberry silk pillowcase, normally priced at $80, at a 50% discount on Amazon. The pillowcase is designed to reduce sleep lines and prevent moisture loss compared to cotton pillowcases.

articles.title: OpenAI launches GPT-5, a potential barometer for whether AI hype is justified
articles.author: MATT O'BRIEN
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5, the latest version of ChatGPT, featuring improvements in coding and safety. Microsoft will incorporate GPT-5 into its AI assistant, Copilot. The new model is available to users with a free ChatGPT account.

articles.title: Dreame's Affordable Alternatives Challenge Dyson's Hair Styling Dominance
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Dreame has launched the Dazzle, a new multi-styling tool with an 'essence mode', challenging Dyson and Shark. The Dazzle features five interchangeable attachments, smart nozzle recognition, and a digital display, aiming to provide versatile hair styling solutions with innovative features at a competitive price. In addition to Dazzle, Dreame has released Hair Glory, Styling Kit and Magic Curl.

articles.title: Dyson Supersonic (funky fresh) — luxury hair dryer over 20% off
articles.author: Charlotte Finch
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 21% discount on the Dyson Supersonic hair dryer. The Dyson Supersonic utilizes a digital motor and intelligent heat regulation to dry hair quickly while minimizing heat damage.

articles.title: This YouTuber Folded the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 200,000 Times. Did It Break?
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold7. A YouTuber tested the phone's durability by folding and unfolding it 200,001 times, revealing reboot errors after every 10,000 folds, creaking at 46,000 folds, and speaker failure at 175,000 folds.

articles.title: Blaize Introduces AI Platform to Power Multi-Modal Intelligence at the Edge
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Blaize Holdings, Inc. unveiled the Blaize AI Platform, an edge-native solution designed for multimodal intelligence in mission-critical workloads. The platform focuses on programmability and ease of deployment to accelerate AI implementation.

articles.title: This Google Assistant Shortcut Trick Is A Game-Changer For Android Users
articles.author: Michael Bizzaco
articles.summary: Google has a 'Shortcuts' feature, available through Google Assistant on Android, that allows users to create custom voice commands for frequently used apps like YouTube and Google Maps.  Users can personalize these commands to automate tasks, such as launching specific channels on YouTube, by saying a custom phrase to Google Assistant. To set up custom shortcuts, navigate to Google Assistant settings and select the Shortcuts menu.

articles.title: Popular hamburger chain opening new Staten Island location that will be ready for tasting this fall
articles.author: Pamela Silvestri
articles.summary: Shake Shack is opening its third Staten Island location in New Dorp this fall. The new location at 2530 Hylan Blvd. will continue the tradition of serving Shake Shack's signature 'concretes'. Shake Shack has cultivated local love on Staten Island over the years cultivating partnerships with its food mavens.

articles.title: Vivo V20 launches with superior selfie camera attributes
articles.author: Ynaija
articles.summary: Vivo launched the Vivo V20, a new addition to their V-series flagship smartphones. The Vivo V20 features superior selfie camera attributes.

articles.title: X‑Design Tops Product Hunt with One-Click Lifestyle Product Photos
articles.summary: X-Design, an AI product photo editor designed for small online sellers, launched and was voted #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt. The tool transforms a single product photo into a complete image set with various backgrounds and settings, aiming to provide realistic and brand-aligned visuals for home decor and handmade goods sellers.

articles.title: LG TO INTRODUCE ADVANCED AI HOME INNOVATIONS AT IFA 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics will introduce its AI Home Solution and ThinQ ON, an AI home hub, at IFA 2025 in Berlin, Germany, from September 5 to 9. The AI Home Solution includes a lineup of AI-powered appliances tailored for the European market, promising a harmonious and personalized smart home experience.

articles.title: All the upcoming Aldi finds next week including a $9.99 slow cooker, an LED mirror and a portable blender
articles.author: Jacob Willeford
articles.summary: ALDI is introducing new products as part of its Aldi Finds promotion. These include the Ambiano Portable Blender for $14.99, Ambiano 2-Quart Slow Cooker for $9.99, Visage Mini LED Mirror for $7.99, Ambiano Jet Fan and Ambiano Rechargeable Bladeless Neck Fan each for $20, Kirkton House Spa Candles for $5.99, Kirkton House 6-Piece Towel Set for $14.99, Halloween decor from Kirkton House and Squishmallows characters for $8.99.

articles.title: Northern Ireland firms unite to develop AI-powered sales enablement app for professional services sector
articles.author: Claire Cartmill
articles.summary: MCO Performance and GCD Technologies partnered to develop a prototype AI-driven platform for business development teams. This platform includes a centralized sales playbook and AI-powered coaching aimed at enhancing productivity, accountability, and strategic alignment for professional services teams. The Discovery Sprint validated the concept and laid the foundation for a high-performance business development culture.

articles.title: ChatGPT 5: A New Model From OpenAI
articles.author: John Werner
articles.summary: OpenAI unveiled the new ChatGPT5 model, featuring enhanced capabilities and versatility. The new model will be rolled out to all OpenAI user tiers, including free users. ChatGPT5 offers improved speed, thoroughness, and agentic capabilities compared to previous versions.

articles.title: Amazon will give you $200 to talk on Samsung's new Galaxy Z Fold7 phone
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal on the new Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 Phone, selling it for $2,000 instead of $2,200 and including a $200 Amazon gift card with the purchase. The phone features a 200-megapixel camera, an 8-inch screen, Google Gemini, a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and enhanced durability.

articles.title: What happens when you fold a Galaxy Z Fold 7 200,000 times? Creaking, leaking, and crashing
articles.author: Roman Loyola
articles.summary: Apple is reportedly considering releasing a folding iPhone next year. This potential new product would arrive several years after the first Android folding phones from Royole and Samsung. The delay is attributed to Apple's high standards and concerns about the durability of folding phone technology.

articles.title: Reviewers Are ‘Blown Away' By This Time-Saving Answer To Shoes That Seem Impossible To Clean — And It's Nearly 20% Off
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: The article features Teletrogy laundry bags designed for washing shoes in washing machines. Additionally, it recommends laundry products from brands like DedCool, Handy Laundry, Tyler Candle Company, Napisan's Vanish, Persil, and Mrs. Stewart's Liquid Bluing, featuring detergents, dryer balls, stain removers, and fabric whiteners.

articles.title: New 'Food Hall' In Toms River Offers Options When You Can't Agree On Dinner
articles.author: Karen Wall
articles.summary: Wonder, a restaurant service company, is opening a new location in Toms River, NJ, on Thursday. This "food hall" and "mealtime super app" allows customers to order from over 15 different restaurants including Limesalt and Tejas Barbecue in a single order for delivery, pick-up, or limited dine-in options.

articles.title: Free wash days this weekend at revamped Greensburg laundromat
articles.author: Renatta Signorini
articles.summary: Nu-Way Laundromat has been renovated by new owner Anna Zaydenberg, introducing updated washers and dryers, a gathering space, vending machines, and a children's play area. These updates aim to enhance the customer experience at the laundromat.

articles.title: This nugget ice maker is more than $150 OFF at Wayfair for a limited time- with free shipping!
articles.author: Ashley Dill
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering the Antarctic Star Nugget Ice Maker at a discounted price of $59.99, originally $212.48. The countertop ice maker produces nugget ice in minutes, making it ideal for various beverages and events. It features fast ice production, a self-cleaning mode, quiet operation, a smart LED display, and a portable design.

articles.title: The Best Beauty Advent Calendars of 2025: A Luxurious Countdown to Christmas
articles.summary: Liberty is launching its 2025 Beauty Advent Calendar in collaboration with Illustrator Clym Evernden, featuring 26 products and golden ticket prizes. Cult Beauty's 2025 advent calendar includes 20 full-sized products from brands like Patrick Ta and Gisou. Harrods is launching both a Beauty Advent Calendar and a Hair & Body Advent Calendar, featuring brands like La Prairie, Oribe, and Sol de Janeiro. Lush is releasing three advent calendars for Christmas 2025. Soap & Glory has launched their advent calendar at Boots.

articles.title: Experience Pool Perfection at Home -- Free Trials of iGarden's High-Tech Pool Innovations Now Available in California
articles.summary: iGarden, a garden robotics brand from Fairland Group, launched its "Free Pool Perfection Experience." This campaign offers a fully immersive, in-home product trial, now available across California for their Robotic Pool Cleaner.

articles.title: OpenAI Aims to Stay Ahead of Rivals With New GPT-5 Technology
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, a new flagship AI model that is described as a significant upgrade to the systems that previously powered ChatGPT. According to OpenAI executives, GPT-5 is faster, more accurate, and feels like talking to an expert in any topic. The technology allows even novices to build simple software apps from short text prompts.

articles.title: realme P Series Evolution From P1 to P4 for Budget Buyers
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Realme is set to launch the P4 Series smartphone, building on the evolution of the P Series based on user feedback. The P4 Series aims to provide a balanced smartphone experience without compromising on performance, design, or usability, targeting young online consumers seeking meaningful value.

articles.title: Next's £52 bestselling dress shoppers say is 'cool and comfortable' for summer
articles.author: Anna Starnes
articles.summary: Next's Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, priced between £52 and £56, is a popular choice among customers, available in white floral, yellow, and teal. New Look offers a similar style with the Brown Checked Puff Sleeve Seersucker Midi Dress for £35.99. M&S has introduced the Pure Cotton Square Neck Midaxi Dress in black for £55, providing a versatile option for autumn.

articles.title: FG flags off YouthCred initiative for NYSC corps members
articles.author: Blessing Adimabua
articles.summary: The Federal Government launched the YouthCred program, a new credit scheme aimed at providing affordable consumer credit to 400,000 young Nigerians, including NYSC members. Eligible Corps members can access up to N200,000 single-digit interest loans for relocation, equipment, skills development, and small-scale enterprises. The program seeks to offer a viable alternative to predatory lenders, providing a more affordable and sustainable credit option.

articles.title: These 'Seriously Delicious' Salads Have Completely Saved My Weekday Lunches (They're Anything But Sad!)
articles.author: Micki Wagner
articles.summary: Gardencup launched a subscription service that delivers premade salads, soups, bowls, and snacks. Gardencup's weekly menu includes more than 45 items catering to various dietary needs, delivered weekly or biweekly. The service offers variety and convenience, with customizable packs and individually priced items.

articles.title: Samsung Ghana Debuts AI-Powered Television Lineup
articles.author: Africa
articles.summary: Samsung Ghana introduced its 2025 Vision AI television series, featuring models like the Neo QLED Mini LED, Neo QLED 8K, and OLED series. These TVs use AI to enhance picture quality and personalize the viewing experience. Pre-order promotions include premium gifts like the Music Frame sound device and the Galaxy Watch8 Classic.

articles.title: Revolut's mobile app updates and new online portal carry tangible benefits
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Revolut has announced new app offerings this month, including a cryptocurrencies news feature, savings goals for Revolut Junior, home screen customization, and bill splitting with non-Revolut users. Revolut also launched a web app for customers in several regions, marking its availability outside a smartphone app. These new features aim to boost customer engagement, expand its user base, and match competitors like Monzo and Starling.

articles.title: Narwal Flow Debuts: Advanced Self-Clean Track-Mopping AI Robot Vacuum
articles.summary: Narwal launched the Narwal Flow, a new all-in-one robot vacuum and mop, on August 7, 2025. The Narwal Flow features include FlowWash Mopping System, Twin-AI Dodge Obstacle Avoidance, and CarpetFocus Technology. The company has been refining the Flow's performance based on user feedback, resulting in a powerful, polished product ready for launch.

articles.title: Nike's newest Air Max Dn sneakers are about to drop, but you can only get them at this one place
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Nike is launching the Air Max Dn sneakers (Summit White and Vivid Orange) for $210, available starting August 7th at 10 a.m. ET. The shoe features a Dynamic Air system with eight pressurized air tubes for enhanced cushioning and responsiveness, along with a low-profile design.

articles.title: There's Now A Robot That Can Do Your Laundry For You
articles.author: Sukhbir Cheema
articles.summary: Figure AI has unveiled its new Figure 02 robot, demonstrated performing laundry tasks such as picking up clothes and loading them into a washing machine. The robot uses Figure AI's Helix VLA model to process visual information and execute commands. While also being developed for industrial tasks, this demonstration highlights the potential for robots assisting with household chores.

articles.title: Donald Trump's company is working to bring AI search to his Twitter alternative
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Truth Social is integrating 'Truth Search AI' powered by Perplexity into its social media platform, with public beta testing planned for its web, iOS and Android versions. Trump Mobile has launched the 'T1 smartphone', emphasizing 'made in America' manufacturing, and is available for pre-order for $499.

articles.title: KwaZulu-Natal Woman Inspires Mzansi With Her Homemade Yoghurt Business
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: A young woman (@makanothe1) in KwaZulu-Natal is launching a yoghurt-making business, showcased in a video. She also offers online classes on how to make yoghurt for R300 per person. The video demonstrates her yogurt-making process.

articles.title: Grok, Elon Musk's AI, allows users to generate NSFW content; here's how to create AI ‘Spicy Mode' images and videos online
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: xAI has launched Grok Imagine, a new feature within its Grok AI platform that generates images and short video clips from text prompts. Grok Imagine includes a 'Spicy Mode' that allows users to generate content that includes partial nudity and sexually suggestive visuals. The feature is currently accessible through the Grok iOS app for Heavy and Premium+ subscribers, and for Heavy tier users on Android.

articles.title: Fresh Food & Fall Flavors at Schlotzsky's in Rogers
articles.author: Jason Suel
articles.summary: Schlotzsky's has launched its new location in Rogers with seasonal fall specials like the Apple Harvest Salad and Sandwich. The new location also offers new Cinnabon Churros with caramel and cream cheese frosting.

articles.title: 30 Deeply Practical Walmart Items For People 25+
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: Pantene Pro-V Volume and Body Shampoo is being raved about for its deep-cleaning abilities and is favored by dermatologists for breaking down oils and adding lift to oily or fine hair. Belkin offers a power bank that holds about three full smartphone charges and can quickly charge portable electronic devices. Milani offers setting spray that has glycerin to help your skin stay hydrated.

articles.title: The best blenders in the US: five favorites for smoothies, soups and frozen drinks
articles.author: Marian Bull
articles.summary: Vitamix 5200, Breville Fresh & Furious, Beast Mega 1200 Plus, Nutribullet Pro 900, and Oster Classic Series Heritage Blender with 6-Cup Glass Jar are introduced and tested. These blenders cater to diverse needs, from smoothies to soups, with features like varying speeds and warranties.

articles.title: Weixin contest seeks solutions for foreign tourists in China
articles.author: Zheng Wanyin
articles.summary: The 2025 Weixin Mini Program Global Innovation Challenge was launched in Oxford, England. The challenge focuses on designing built-in features within Weixin mini programs to enhance the experience of foreign tourists in China. Weixin mini programs offer functionalities including shopping, travel booking, banking and payment and government services.

articles.title: M&S issues 'last chance' warning to shoppers as viral limited edition item set to leave shelves
articles.author: Miranda Pell
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) is alerting customers that its limited-edition Strawberries and Creme Sandwich will only be available for a few more days. This sandwich, featuring strawberries and cream between sweetened bread, gained popularity on social media and is described as a must-try treat. M&S encourages customers to visit their local Foodhall to purchase the product before it is gone.

articles.title: Best AI Paraphrasing Tools in 2025: Unlock Smarter, Faster Content Rewriting
articles.author: Zimble Digital
articles.summary: The article introduces several AI paraphrasing tools like QuillBot, Jasper AI, Wordtune, Copy AI, Hypotenuse AI, Writesonic, and Rytr, highlighting their unique features, pricing, and ideal use cases. These tools are designed to assist writers, marketers, and students in rewriting content efficiently, ensuring originality, and enhancing their writing workflow. The tools offer features such as style tuners, plagiarism checks, grammar checks, tone customization, and AI image generation.

articles.title: The Fold Test: Can Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 Handle Over 200,000 Fold And Survive?
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung's new Galaxy Z Fold 7 has been tested for durability, with a YouTuber subjecting it to 200,000 folds. The test revealed some issues, including a reboot between 6,000-10,000 folds, liquid leaking from the hinge around 75,000 folds, and speaker failure at 175,000 folds. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is priced at Rs 1,74,999 in India and features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, 120Hz LTPO displays, and a 200MP primary camera.

articles.title: This mini projector beats more expensive models (and took 5 minutes to set up)
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: Dangbei has released the N2 Mini projector, available on Amazon for $189. The projector is easy to set up and delivers crisp 1080p video, with a simple remote. The projector is noted for its simplicity of use.

articles.title: Plant-based egg alternative Just Egg launches into the UK with Ocado listing
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: Just Egg, a US egg alternative brand made from mung bean, is launching in the UK with its first listing at Ocado. The product, containing 13g of protein per serving, can be cooked like a normal egg and will be manufactured in Vegan Food Group's German factory, who has exclusive rights to manufacture and supply Just Egg across European markets.

articles.title: This Innovative PPE Has a Space-Age Aesthetic
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: VYZRTech's Personal Air Purifying Shield is on sale.

articles.title: Brand Nudie Jeans Set to Launch its First African Store in Sandton
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: Nudie Jeans launched its first African store in Sandton City, Johannesburg. The store offers free repairs for life on all Nudie Jeans and features a trade-in program for preloved jeans. The brand also plans collaborations with local creatives, promoting sustainability and a community-focused approach.

articles.title: Now Showing: Fried-Chicken Fan Favorite, Jollibee, Premieres Its NEW Angus Beef Burgers
articles.author: Jollibee
articles.summary: Jollibee has launched a new line of Angus Beef Burgers in Canada. The new burgers are available in three options: Angus Cheeseburger, Angus Deluxe Burger, and Angus Aloha Burger. The new Angus Burgers are available at all Canada locations starting at C$8.49.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Review: Impressive Battery Life For A Phone Priced Under Rs. 10,000, But...
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Lava launched the Blaze Dragon 5G, a new entry-level smartphone featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon chipset, 5G connectivity, UFS 3.1 storage, a 120Hz refresh rate display, and a 50-megapixel AI camera. The Lava Blaze Dragon 5G is priced at ₹9,999 for the 4GB RAM variant and is available exclusively on Amazon.

articles.title: Bought a Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 or Z Flip7? You Can Get $120 Worth of Google AI Pro for Free.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 foldable smartphones, experiencing a significant pre-order jump compared to previous models. To incentivize early adoption, Samsung is offering six months of Google AI Pro to new and existing owners of these devices.

articles.title: With love from France – and now, Bangladesh!
articles.author: Prothom Alo English Desk
articles.summary: Skin Cafe, a Bangladeshi skincare brand, has launched the country's first locally made micellar water. The product is designed to be affordable, gentle, and suitable for the local climate and skin needs. Skin Cafe has expanded its product line beyond natural oils to include moisturizers, sunscreen, serums, and makeup.

articles.title: HONOR Announces the Upcoming Launch of the HONOR Magic V5, the Smarter, Slimmer & Stronger
articles.author: arabtimes
articles.summary: HONOR is launching the HONOR Magic V5, a foldable smartphone featuring an ultra-slim design, a large battery, and a durable hinge. The device includes AI-powered features like the Magic Sidebar and pre-installed Google Gemini, along with an advanced camera system. It is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon® 8 Elite Mobile Platform and will be available for pre-order soon in multiple colors.

articles.title: Dyson's Supersonic hair dryer is on sale for the lowest price available
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $100 discount on the blue version of its Supersonic hair dryer, bringing the price down to $299. The hair dryer features intelligent heat control to minimize heat damage and includes five magnetic styling attachments.

articles.title: The Morning After: Samsung might not release a new Galaxy Note next year
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung is considering pausing the Galaxy Note series in 2021. However, the S-Pen stylus, compatible with Galaxy S devices, may continue to be available.

articles.title: 19 Shoes That'll Be Comfortable *And* Look Good When You Need To Spend All Day On Your Feet
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Steve Madden introduced sandals comparable to Hermès shoes. Fila launched platform sneakers with extra padding. Dr. Martens presented Rometty boots with air-cushioned soles. Bjork presented Maja clogs with a wooden sole. Nike provides air forces for urban hiking. New Balance introduced 608 V5 Cross Trainers. Reebok created Women's Club C 85 vintage sneakers. Crocs presented platforms clogs that are lightweight and waterproof. Allbirds presented wool runners.

articles.title: Design Limitless by Hyperlink InfoSystem Becomes a One-Stop Creative Partner for Branding, UI/UX, Motion Graphics & More
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Hyperlink InfoSystem has launched Design Limitless, a subscription-based creative service offering branding, motion graphics, UI/UX, and 3D design. The service caters to startups, agencies, and enterprises with three subscription plans: Essentials, Standard, and Enterprise, each offering varying levels of service and support. The aim is to provide businesses with high-quality design solutions and streamline the creative process.

articles.title: Panasonic launches ShinobiPro mini LED 4K smart TV range in India
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Panasonic launched its new P series TV range in India on August 7, 2025, including the ShinobiPro mini LED range. The new lineup features 21 LED models, ranging from ShinobiPro mini LED to Full HD Google TVs, with prices starting from ₹17,990. The TVs are available across Panasonic authorised stores, e-commerce platforms, and Panasonic's D2C platform.

articles.title: LG TO INTRODUCE ADVANCED AI HOME INNOVATIONS AT IFA 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics will showcase its AI Home Solution at IFA 2025 in Berlin. This AI-powered appliance is designed to enrich and enhance the European lifestyle. The theme of LG's exhibit is "LG AI Appliances Orchestra."

articles.title: Here's how you can get a washing machine in the Netherlands for just €17 per month
articles.author: Jana Vondráčková
articles.summary: BlueMovement offers a subscription service for household appliances from Bosch and Siemens in the Netherlands.  For a monthly fee, customers can rent appliances like washing machines, refrigerators, and dishwashers with delivery, installation, and maintenance included.  At the end of the contract, customers have the option to return the appliance or buy it at a reduced cost.

articles.title: Best 9 Kg 5 star washing machines on Amazon in 2025: Top 8 front load and top load washing machines
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article highlights several 9 kg 5-star rated washing machines available in 2025 from brands including Samsung, LG, Bosch and IFB. These washing machines feature technologies like Eco Bubble, AI Direct Drive, and EcoSilence Drive, as well as smart features like Wi-Fi connectivity and AI-powered settings, all designed to improve cleaning performance and energy efficiency. The washing machines come in both front-load and top-load models to suit different user preferences.

articles.title: How to get free NFL tickets and free NFL Sunday Ticket through Verizon
articles.author: Leah Stodart
articles.summary: Verizon is offering a free NFL Sunday Ticket for the 2025 season to customers who switch to select phone or home internet plans through Sept. 23. Existing Verizon customers also have the opportunity to score free tickets to NFL games on the My Verizon app starting August 7.

articles.title: Could this new Benefit foundation give you flawless skin? We put it to the test
articles.author: Lydia Wheatley
articles.summary: Benefit has launched 'The POREfessional Smoothing & Blurring Foundation,' designed to smooth texture, blur pores, and provide a flawless look. The foundation offers medium-buildable, weightless coverage with a natural-matte finish and includes skincare ingredients like Rose Hip Extract, Glycerin, and Niacinamide for hydration and pore refinement. Consumer reviews highlight its impressive coverage, long wear, and skin-perfecting qualities.

articles.title: This Under-$100 Steam Mop Can Tackle So Many Nooks And Crannies
articles.author: Marsha Badger
articles.summary: Customers are sharing positive experiences with a new steam mop. Users highlight that the product cleans floors effectively, removes stains, and leaves a clean scent. Additionally, the mop's detachable steamer is effective for cleaning ovens and other areas.

articles.title: IT'S OFFICIAL CANADA - NESTEA® RTD IS HERE Français
articles.author: Keurig Dr Pepper Canada
articles.summary: Keurig Dr Pepper Canada (KDP Canada) is launching Nestea ® in a ready-to-drink format across Canada. Nestea ® RTD is available in four flavors: Lemon, Peach, Raspberry, and Lemon Zero Sugar and is supported by a national marketing campaign titled ''Nothing's Like Nestea ®.''

articles.title: My Favorite $7 Liquid Lipsticks Lasts Through a Macchiato and a Makeout
articles.author: Katie Berohn
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews various liquid lipstick products from brands like Chanel, Lancôme, Stila, Dior, Glossier, ABH, Rare Beauty, Fenty Beauty, Nars, and Maybelline. Each product review highlights the texture, finish, and benefits, such as non-transfer formulas, moisturizing properties, and long-lasting color.

articles.title: Microsoft's agentic AI roadmap had a flaw that let hackers take over browsers — here's what to know and how to stay safe
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced NLWeb, a framework for AI browsing, announced at Build 2025. Opera launched the world's first on-device agentic AI browser. These introductions highlight a significant shift towards agentic browsing, but also raise security concerns.

articles.title: Free wash days this weekend at revamped Greensburg laundromat
articles.author: Renatta Signorini
articles.summary: Nu-Way Laundromat, under new ownership, has been renovated with updated washers and dryers and a new electronic card system. To celebrate, Nu-Way Laundromat is offering free laundry services during its grand reopening weekend with a free lunch, bounce house, corn hole and other activities.

articles.title: Forget Roomba — DJI just swapped drones for robot vacuums with the DJI Romo
articles.summary: DJI is launching its first robot vacuum, the DJI Robo, in China. The DJI Robo uses fisheye cameras, a LiDAR system, and AI for navigation and mapping. There are three models: A, S, and P, differing primarily in design, with all models having 25,000 pascal suction power, a 2.4-liter dust bag, and a three-hour battery life.

articles.title: Simple reason Meghan Markle's wine hasn't sold out spotted in new statement
articles.author: Hanisha Sethi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, launched a new Napa Valley rosé wine on August 5th.  The wine, priced at £22 ($30) per bottle, is available in batches of three, six, and twelve. The brand also introduced rosé popsicles made with the wine.

articles.title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival ends tonight: Unlock best deals on top 10 washing machines with up to 50% off
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: LG, Haier, Samsung, Godrej and Bosch are offering various fully-automatic and semi-automatic washing machines during the Amazon Great Freedom Festival. These machines come with features like AI Ecobubble, Oceanus Wave Drum, Smart Inverter Technology, Steam Wash, and AI-powered controls, catering to different family sizes and needs with energy-efficient operation and specialized wash programs.

articles.title: Only Prime Members Can Score This Cloud-Like Mattress Topper for $36
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: Drovan is introducing the Pillow Top Mattress Pad as a cost-effective alternative to soften mattresses. The queen size is currently available for $36 for Prime members. The mattress pad accommodates mattresses up to 21 inches thick and includes a 360-degree elastic band.

articles.title: Boost Your Brand With Expert Search Engine Marketing Services
articles.summary: ARSN Media offers Search Engine Marketing (SEM) services to improve online visibility, generate leads, and enhance brand recognition. These services encompass ad creation, keyword planning, and analytics, ensuring effective campaign management. The focus is on strategies that maximize results within budget, turning SEM into a beneficial investment.

articles.title: McDonald's makes major change to 'classic' McChicken Sandwich
articles.author: Kate Lally
articles.summary: McDonald's is offering the McChicken Sandwich for £1.39 on Monday, August 11, through the McDonald's app. This promotional offer is available during specific hours and requires customers to redeem it via the 'offers' section of the app, using a 4-digit offer or QR code at kiosks or drive-thrus.

articles.title: Aldi's ‘magic' winter gadget is back & £60 cheaper than Kärcher – it cleans windows & gets rid of condensation & mould
articles.author: Alex Lancaster-Lennox
articles.summary: Aldi introduced the Ambiano Electric Window Cleaner in 2024 for £19.99, a budget-friendly alternative to tackle condensation. The product features a rubber lip, motorised nozzle, microfibre cloths, and a spray bottle. Aldi's window cleaner boasts a longer battery life and larger water capacity compared to Kärcher's Window Vac WV 2 Plus N, which retails for £79.99.

articles.title: Dreame NYC VIP Product Launch Event
articles.author: 네버 엔딩 히스토리
articles.summary: Dreame Technology hosted a VIP product launch event at Lavan Midtown in New York on August 6, 2025. The event showcased new products from Dreame Technology.

articles.title: Shopping for a robot? China's new robot store in photos
articles.summary: A government-run "Robot Mall" opened in Beijing E-Town, China, aiming to commercialize humanoid robots. The facility, dubbed a 4S store (sales, service, spare parts, surveys), showcases robots performing tasks like serving drinks, playing chess, and sorting trash to help robotics companies with sales, marketing, and customer feedback.

articles.title: McVitie's adds ‘must-try' Yuzu Lemon Jaffa Cakes to lure foodies
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: McVitie's has introduced a limited-edition Yuzu Lemon flavor for its Jaffa Cakes, featuring a 'tangy yuzu lemon jelly' on the classic sponge base covered in chocolate, becoming available at Tesco on August 13. This follows the launch of Hot Honey Jaffa Cakes in June and Jaffa Cola Bottle in 2024, expanding their range of innovative Jaffa Cake flavors.

articles.title: How LambdaTest Levels The Playing Field For Businesses Selling Online
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: LambdaTest's platform analyzes business websites to assess their performance, indicating the introduction of a new service by the company.

articles.title: Baidu Plans to Launch New Reasoning Model by End August
articles.author: Tracy Qu
articles.summary: Baidu plans to launch a new reasoning model by the end of the month to compete with DeepSeek and OpenAI. Furthermore, Baidu intends to release Ernie 5.0, a new version of its core foundation model, in the coming months.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Grok Unveils NSFW ‘Spicy Mode' for Premium Users on iOS
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: xAI has introduced 'Spicy Mode' to its Grok Imagine, an AI-powered text-to-image and video generator. This new feature, available to SuperGrok and Premium+ subscribers on iOS, enables users to generate stylised short videos and images from text prompts, including semi-explicit and NSFW visuals with moderation. Grok Imagine is capable of turning prompts into 15-second animated clips complete with native audio.

articles.title: 20 years of Toyota Innova: A legacy of reliability and value
articles.summary: Toyota Kirloskar Motor celebrated 20 years of the Toyota Innova, a versatile MPV, introducing three generations: Innova, Innova Crysta, and Innova HyCross. The Innova Crysta, launched in 2016, featured improved design and technology, while the Innova HyCross, launched in 2022, integrated hybrid technology and a crossover design.

articles.title: Appear on Google's First Page - Best SEO Experts in Noida
articles.author: Hans India Digital
articles.summary: Manoj Negi's SEO expert team in Noida has announced specialized SEO services to help local businesses achieve first-page Google rankings. They are also offering one month of local SEO for free, including keyword research and SEO optimization. This new initiative targets small and medium-sized businesses looking to improve their online visibility.

articles.title: InstaService — The Startup Quietly Disrupting Thumbtack & TaskRabbit
articles.author: satmin
articles.summary: InstaService, an AI-powered platform for on-demand home services, has launched to redefine how Americans handle everyday household needs. The platform enables customers to book pre-vetted service professionals quickly for tasks like handyman repair services, cleaning, and minor plumbing or electrical fixes, and the company is planning a seed funding round to enhance expansion and engineering investment.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Is Focused On Performance But Delivers Good Value
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the Nord 5, featuring a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, a 6.83-inch AMOLED 1B colors panel with a 144Hz refresh rate, and a 50MP main camera. The device also includes a 6,800mAh battery with 80W charging support and a new Plus Key button.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Local Union Goes On Strike In Novato
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network, making it America's best mobile network, according to Ookla Speedtest. They are thanked for supporting the community by keeping it connected.

articles.title: OpenAI Brings Open-Source GPT AI Models That Are Powerful But Can Run On Your Phones
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: OpenAI launched new open-source GPT models (GPT-OSS 120b and 20b) which can be customised as per needs. These models can run on hardware like phones and laptops. Also, OpenAI is planning to introduce a new premium subscription tier for ChatGPT called 'ChatGPT Go' priced lower than the Plus model.

articles.title: 52 Budget-Friendly Versions Of The Things You've Been Eyeing But Your Wallet Has Said 'No'
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article presents a compilation of affordable alternatives to luxury products and services across various categories such as cosmetics, clothing, and accessories. It emphasizes budget-friendly options that mimic the quality or style of higher-end items from brands like Lululemon, Skims, and Chanel, offering consumers cost-effective alternatives without sacrificing perceived quality or style.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Grok adds NSFW Spicy Mode for premium X users: All you need to know
articles.summary: xAI has launched Grok Imagine, a text-to-image and video generator, available to SuperGrok and Premium+ subscribers on its iOS app. The tool allows users to generate stylised 15-second videos from prompts, including a 'Spicy Mode' for creating NSFW content. While it has limitations like waxy skin textures, Grok Imagine is praised for its speed and accessibility.

articles.title: Trump's Truth Social Unveils Perplexity-Powered AI Search Tool to Rival Google
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Truth Social has launched Truth Search AI, a new AI-powered search engine developed with Perplexity. The new tool is available in beta on the web version of Truth Social and uses Perplexity's Sonar API to allow clients to tailor the AI engine according to their own preferences, including the ability to prioritize or restrict sources. Truth Search AI is intended to enhance the Truth Social platform.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: New T.J. Maxx store opening in Clinton this month
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T.J. Maxx is set to open a new store in Clinton on August 21. This new store is a part of a larger expansion with multiple locations across the country. It will offer budget-friendly shopping options for local residents.

articles.title: This Working Life: ‘People see a mock-up of their house before they build and they leave reassured'
articles.summary: Emma provides customers with a service to visualize house builds or renovations. Customers can virtually walk through a mock-up of their project before construction begins.

articles.title: New Toll Brothers Luxury Home Community Coming Soon to Newtown, Pennsylvania  Aug. 7, 2025 03:20
articles.summary: Toll Brothers is launching Lyondale Meadows, a new luxury home community in Newtown, Pennsylvania, in the fall of 2025. The community will feature 45 homes with modern single-family designs, ranging from 3,520 to over 5,000 square feet and priced from $1.6 million, offering customizable options at the Toll Brothers Design Studio.

articles.title: HDFX Launches Singapore's First EV Truck Battery Swap Station
articles.author: HDFX
articles.summary: EcoSwift launched its Battery Charge and Swop Station (BCSS), Singapore's first public charging and battery-swop station for electric heavy commercial vehicles. HDFX Pte Ltd served as the official event organizer, designing and building a 3D replica of the station and overseeing the logistical setup for the launch event.

articles.title: Aura is not just another AI tool, it chases deadlines too
articles.summary: ^a t o m Network launched Aura, an AI-driven creative engine designed for speed and brand alignment in content creation. Aura generates visuals and videos, incorporating brand guidelines and market signals and it's aimed at improving efficiency in mid- and lower-funnel marketing stages, like retargeting and programmatic targeting.

articles.title: We Made A Skit About Convincing Your Boss To Belanja KFC — And Yes, It Was Inspired By Real Office Shenanigans
articles.author: Chandini Del
articles.summary: KFC is promoting its KFC Rewards program through its app, where users can earn and redeem points for items like Cheezy Wedges, burgers, and fries. A limited-time offer allows users to redeem items starting from just 11 points.

articles.title: AI-Powered Compact Smartphone: A Business Perspective
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Flip7, a foldable phone featuring enhanced AI capabilities and a larger display. Key new features include an improved flexwindow with AI-driven photo enhancements and integration with Google Gemini for voice-controlled assistance. The device also introduces Samsung DeX compatibility for desktop-like productivity.

articles.title: HDFX Powers the Launch of Singapore's First EV Truck Battery Swop Station
articles.summary: EcoSwift launched its Battery Charge and Swop Station (BCSS) in Singapore, marking a step towards green logistics. HDFX Pte Ltd managed the launch event, featuring a 3D replica of the station and a live demonstration of the battery-swapping technology. The launch aimed to showcase the innovation and functionality of EcoSwift's new service.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' summer dress shoppers think looks more expensive than it is
articles.author: Jodie Bradley
articles.summary: Next is offering the Ecru White Floral Placement Print Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress With Linen for £38. ASOS features the Elastic Waist T Shirt Midi Dress, now priced at £14.50. New Look has the Stripe Print Smock Midi Dress available for £23.99.

articles.title: 28 Semi-Embarrassing Things You Can Buy Online
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Mielle is launching Rosemary Mint strengthening oil, a biotin-infused formula to help strengthen hair, smooth split ends, and hydrate dry scalps. There is also Veet's sensitive hair removal gel which gently removes hair and helps reduce the chance of painful ingrowns.  Poo-Pourri has released a before-you-go toilet spray that traps any embarrassing odor under the water's surface.

articles.title: 33 Products With Such Impressive Results That Oops, You Might Get A Little Bit Of A God Complex Using Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Mario Badescu launched Drying Lotion for acne treatment. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream. The Pink Stuff released "Sqeezy" sponge set. Eos launched Cashmere Vanilla Cashmere Whipped Oil Body Butter. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, Clinique introduced Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, Biodance introduced Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask and Kahi launched Wrinkle Bounce Hydrating Multi-Balm and Garnier launched Fructis Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum.

articles.title: 'Brighton Grey' Appears on This New Balance ABZORB 2010
articles.summary: New Balance is set to launch the ABZORB 2010 'Brighton Grey' sneaker on August 20. The sneaker, featuring a 'Brighton Grey/Linen' colorway, will retail for $160 USD and be available via New Balance and select retailers. A 'Black' counterpart is expected to launch alongside it.

articles.title: 5 best jojoba oils to improve your skincare regime in 2025
articles.author: Harriet Amurao
articles.summary: The Australian Jojoba oil, formulated with Australian Wadi-Wadi Jojoba, is extra-virgin, cold-pressed, and filtered 14 times. Gya Labs Organic Jojoba Oil is a bestseller on Amazon. Aveeno offers a convenient oil spray featuring jojoba and oat oil for nourishing and smoothing the skin.

articles.title: We Found 28 Early Labor Day Mattress Sales On Editor-Tested Beds
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Helix, Nectar, and DreamCloud initiated early Labor Day mattress sales. These sales include deals on the sleep editors' favorite beds.

articles.title: Huawei open-sources chip software ecosystem
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: Huawei has announced the full open-source release of its Ascend chip software ecosystem, CANN (Compute Architecture for Neural Networks). The release aims to support users in exploring its potential and undertaking customized development independently.

articles.title: HDFX Powers the Launch of Singapore's First EV Truck Battery Swop Station
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: Singapore Events Company delivered a full-scale launch experience. EcoSwift reached a Green Mobility milestone.

articles.title: Renol Polychem IPO listing today. GMP indicates mild premium
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Renol Polychem is launching its IPO on the NSE SME platform this Thursday. The IPO was subscribed 6.83 times.

articles.title: Beauty Brand Bubblzz Is Now Serving Ice Cream on the North Coast
articles.summary: Bubblzz, an Egyptian skincare brand, has launched an ice cream shop in Sahel. The shop offers both gelato and skincare products with matching scents, blurring the lines between beauty and food. The Bubblzz outpost, located on the North Coast, combines a beauty lab with a dessert shop experience.

articles.title: 3 Lessons Learned From Building Our First AI Agent
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Jotform launched its first AI agents after observing the generative AI trend. They initially developed AI-powered forms but discovered users preferred using it for customer service. Jotform adapted based on user data, prioritizing efficiency and multi-channel integration in their AI agents to better serve customers.

articles.title: Alibaba's Freshippo plans to open 100 new stores by March 2026
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Freshippo, Alibaba Group's grocery arm, plans to open about 100 new stores by March 2026, raising the total store count to over 500. Between 2024 and March 2025, Freshippo opened nearly 70 new stores and entered 27 new cities. In the first half of this year, it launched in cities such as Tianjin, Shijiazhuang, Tangshan and Taizhou.

articles.title: Feature: Young entrepreneurs let dreams take flight amid China's innovation drive
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
org: Beijing Subway Line 10 Youth Entrepreneurship Village
articles.summary: Glacier Wisdom has created the AI Power Box, an AI-powered psychological health product. Dream Lab is helping a student to produce a smart teacup prototype that can display temperature and automatically select brewing methods. Beijing Volumetric Capture Technology Co., Ltd is providing service by leveraging volumetric technology to convert real human images into holographic virtual images.

articles.title: Hair demo with Alli Webb
articles.summary: Alli Webb, founder of Drybar, is introducing her new hair brand, Messy. She is also demonstrating how to use Messy products.

articles.title: Future-Proofing Your Business with Custom Digital Solutions by theAD
articles.summary: The Sydney-based company, theAd, offers custom digital solutions like website and app development and e-commerce solutions. theAd focuses on building easy-to-use, simple-to-update digital tools and booking systems backed by ongoing support, tailored to specific business requirements, enabling business growth and relevance.
